Title: HeadLinx AD
Description: HeadLinx AD lets you visually explore the relationships between people in your organization using the contact information in Active Directory.  The application was written in C# and utilizes the WPF framework available on .NET 3.0 and above.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

HeadLinx AD lets you visually explore the relationships between people in your organization using the contact information in Active Directory. The application was written in C# and utilizes the WPF framework available on .NET 3.0 and above.

New members please read the introduction.
